title: French Army survivors after key battles to and from Moscow 1812 — minard_troops
text: Napoleon's invasion subsequent retreat Russia notable significant loss life.  exact numbers elusive, historians estimate Napoleon began campaign 450,000 troops ended 120,000.  Napoleon's eastward progress ended Moscow November 1812.  Inadequate supplies required French Army retreat onset winter like conditions.  Frigid temperatures disease decimated remaining army.  Charles Joseph Minard, early pioneer visualization, captured French Army's losses famous graphic called "best statistical graphic ever drawn" Edward Tufte.
